quotas.description: Resource quotas and usage limits for the organization.

maxWorkspaces.description: Maximum number of workspaces allowed in the organization.

maxMembers.description: Maximum number of members allowed in the organization.

maxTeams.description: Maximum number of teams allowed in the organization.

maxPipelinesPerWorkspace.description: Maximum number of pipelines allowed per workspace.

maxParticipantsPerWorkspace.description: Maximum number of participants allowed per workspace.

maxDatasetsPerWorkspace.description: Maximum number of datasets allowed per workspace.

maxVersionsPerDataset.description: Maximum number of versions allowed per dataset.

maxRuns.description: Maximum number of concurrent workflow runs allowed.

maxRunHistory.description: Maximum number of workflow runs to retain in history.

maxLabelsPerWorkspace.description: Maximum number of labels allowed per workspace.

maxDataStudiosRunning.description: Maximum number of Studios instances that can run concurrently.

maxSeqeraComputeComputeEnvs.description: Maximum number of Seqera Compute environments allowed per organization.

maxFusionThroughputBytes.description: Maximum Fusion throughput in bytes allowed.

quotas.title: OrganizationQuotas
